attributes.action: Enforce the £30 fine for cycling on FOOTpaths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst I understand children may need to cycle on the footpaths sometimes, the fine was brought in to stop cyclists from running people over as they walk along minding their own business. I have met with quite a few close shaves where the bicycle has met me and my 2 German Shepherds on the blind bend of 2 streets and one of my dogs hates cyclists! Now if my dog were to react inappropriately to the cyclist/bike on the FOOTpath, who would get in the most trouble?!!?
And all I get is a mouthful of abuse from the cyclist.
